attributes.action: To make prison unutterably awful for those that CHOOSE to go there through their actions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, we have criminals that do not fear prison.  Most either laugh at it as the soft touch joke that it is, or they welcome it as a free hotel, paid for by the tax-payer.  We even have people trying to break in - this says all that needs to be said about our prisons.  It is time to adopt hard, chain-gang style hell-holes so that our voluntary criminal fraternity do not enjoy a a better life than the tax paying public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
